PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: It displays your typing speed per key and frequency of each finger used and gross speed of your typing, according to a fixed standard typing pattern. This web app displays a live (dynamic) graph between the typing speed per key with respect to the count of each finger used.

It is  a google chrome extension that allows you to book tickets with just a click while you plan 
your trip to http://www.triphobo.com/

Blogged is basically a blogging website where one can create and manage his/her blogs and search for other blogs and users can review the blogger and blogs. For authentication or signing up, the user can use Google+/Facebook/LocalAuthentication and can manage his/her profile by linking/unlinking social media accounts.
It is a Python Script to clean the Desktop & any other directory and arrange files systematically in different directories according to their name extensions.
